thread.title: James Corden Starts "Sweet Caroline" Singalong - Watch "Sweet Caroline" Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys
thread.title_full: James Corden Starts "Sweet Caroline" Singalong - Watch "Sweet Caroline" Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys

author: Sarah Lindig
title: James Corden Starts "Sweet Caroline" Singalong - Watch "Sweet Caroline" Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys
text: This is the feel-good moment we all needed. Grammys host James Corden brought his beloved carpool karaoke segment to the live awards show scene. Kicking off a rendition of everyone's favorite singalong, Neil Diamond's "Sweet Caroline," Cordon was joined by Jennifer Lopez, Tim McGraw, Faith Hill, Keith Urban, John Legend, Ryan Tedder, Neil Diamond, Jason Derulo in a cardboard cut-out of a car. The group delivered a sweet-as-can-be performance of the song and soon enough the entire crowd was joining in the crooning and hand-clapping. Even Blue Ivy jumped in on the high-spirited karaoke moment. Watch below:
